name: Black Box (powerbot2001)
description:
Welcome, Private.  You have been issued the esteemed position of artillery operator. Our squad leader, Harvey, is active on the front, he will be issuing you orders. Each order starts with the location of the unit, and ends with the target. Enemies have been known to intercept our communications and issue false orders. Act accordingly.

The game is played purely by clicking the mouse.

Made with Unity in 3h04m21s as part of Trijam#200, inspired by the boardgame Battleship and Papers Please. You can watch the VOD for the devstream here.

Credits:

  • Programming and art by me, Rinor aka powerbot2001
  • Monogram font by datagoblin (CC0)
  • "Steel and Seething" song by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
